headline: Today we mitigated 1.1.1.1
keywords: Reliability, Post Mortem, Mitigation, 1.1.1.1, DNS, Resolver, Gatebot
description: Cloudflare is protected from attacks by the Gatebot DDoS mitigation pipeline. Gatebot performs hundreds of mitigations a day, shielding our infrastructure and our customers from L3 and L7 attacks.
